title: Tango Warmup
body:
(1) Shoulder rolls
(2) Hip sway
(3) Breath focus

title: Tango Core
body:
(1) Plank 45s
(2) Dead bug 20 reps
(3) Side plank 30s each

title: Tango Partner Flow
body:
(1) Connection drills
(2) Echo steps
(3) Sync breathing

title: Tango Cooldown
body:
(1) Deep stretch
(2) Slow promenades
(3) Guided relaxation
